name: hAIst
description:
hAIst is an endless-runner that trains your multitasking skills.

You have access to the Smart-Home of a whelty mansion owner and now it is time to make some money.

Task the AI to perform essential actions like opening the safes for you while you are chased by the police.

Collect valuables to earn money and reach a new highscore, but be aware of the officers lurking behind every door trying to cath you.

Controls:
  • Jump with Space, Up-Arrow or W
  • Access the AI with your Mouse or the Hotkeys 1 - 5

I created this game all on my own and did everything from scratch for the WOWIE Jam 4.0, EXCEPT:

2 Icons:

Repeat icons created by IconKanan - Flaticon

Home icons created by Dave Gandy - Flaticon

Music:

Background Music from PlayOnLoop.com

Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0

Sounds:

All sounds are downloaded from

mixkit.co/free-sound-effects

fesliyanstudios.com
